mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (reply_text, reply_writer, board_no, account) VALUES (#{replyText}, #{replyWriter}, #{boardNo}, #{account})
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.profile_image FROM tbl_reply A LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member B ON A.account = B.account WHERE board_no = #{bn} ORDER BY reply_no LIMIT #{p.pageStart}, #{p.amount}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET reply_text = #{replyText}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE reply_no = #{replyNo}
